long_description: Great for light touring or commuting, the waterproof Ortlieb Micro Saddle Pack delivers excellent protection from the elements and convenient mounting to your road or mountain bike. Made of tough, long-lasting coated Cordura(R) nylon fabric; roll closure with integrated elastic cords and hooks secures load. Mounts quickly and easily to seat braces, and fixing plate with release lever offers single-handed removal for quick detachment. Bag is rated to IP64 protection, meaning it is dust-proof and protected against splashing water coming from all directions. Reflective detailing increases your visibility in low light.
short_description: Great for light touring or commuting, the waterproof Ortlieb Micro Saddle Pack delivers excellent protection from the elements and convenient mounting to your road or mountain bike.
